content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **learn more about the harvest hues crochet along & collection and get signed up here ** 1 **add a splash of color to your wardrobe the rainbow hues crochet cardigan** *this pattern is included in the harvest hues collection* brighten up your day with the rainbow hues crochet cardigan a vibrant easy-to-make cardigan that s sure to become a favorite in your handmade collection this eye-catching design is perfect for those who love to play with color while keeping things simple and stylish **what makes this cardigan stand out ** * *stunning colorway ** despite its dazzling array of colors this cardigan is crafted using just two colorways of yarn making it a fun and affordable project that looks far more complex than it is * *effortless style ** the v-neck design combined with a tie-front closure creates a flattering and casual silhouette that s perfect for layering over your favorite outfits * *quick & unique trim edging ** the cardigan features a unique and quick trim edging that adds a polished finish without the fuss making it a joy to crochet from start to finish * *versatile & fun ** whether you re new to crochet or an experienced maker this pattern is designed to be both approachable and enjoyable allowing you to create a piece that s as fun to wear as it is to make perfect for crocheters of all levels this pattern comes with detailed instructions including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step crochet hook h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 yarn lion brand color theory 6 100% acrylic 246yds/100g colorway moonbeam and lion brand mandala ombre 7 100% acrylic 344 yds/ 150g colorway harmony also shown in mary maxim mellowspun dk 8 100% acrylic 284 yds/100g colorway white and mary maxim prism dk 9 100% acrylic 290yds/100g colorway rainbow yardage 1320 1450 1570 1685 1800 1860 1915 1980 2040 main color yardage 715 780 850 910 975 1005 1035 1070 1100 yardage for each diamondaccent color 605 670 720 775 825 855 880 910 940 yarn substitutions wecrochet brava 10 100% premium acrylic 218 yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 11 100% ultra soft acrylic 180 yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet flo - front loop only round - round rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space s - space s st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 12 gauge 15 sts x 9 row unblocked= 4x4 in granny stitch not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46
